motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of September 11, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • SECOND READ: Review and Consideration of a Text Amendment to Amend Regulations for Entertainment Districts • Funding Authorization for 4706 Equestrian Way Storm Repairs • Funding Authorization for 4964 Buckline Crossing Storm Repairs • Funding Authorization for 5233 Fontainebleau Ct Storm Repairs • Funding Authorization for 5548 Glenrich Drive Storm Repairs • Funding Authorization for 5596 Mill Gate Court Storm Repairs

motions.title: Contract Award for Parks and Right of Way Maintenance
motions.description: Award of three-year contract with two one-year renewal options to TriScapes, Inc., who submitted the highest ranked proposal for parks and right of way maintenance.

motions.title: Project Agreement with Georgia Department of Transportation
motions.description: Approval of entering into the project agreement with the Georgia Department of Transportation for preliminary engineering on the Chamblee Dunwoody-Village Crossroads project to receive Federal funds.
